005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.xml;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.DynamicContext;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ISequence;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathExpression;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathExpression.ResultType;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.StaticContext;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.IItem;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node.IDefinitionNodeItem;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node.IModuleNodeItem;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node.INodeItemFactory;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IModule;
018import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IModuleLoader;
019import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.IConstraintSet;
020import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.ITargetedConstraints;
021import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.impl.ConstraintComposingVisitor;
022import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
023
024import org.apache.logging.log4j.LogManager;
025import org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger;
026
027import java.util.Collection;
028import java.util.List;
029import java.util.stream.Collectors;
030import java.util.stream.Stream;
031
032import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
033
034/**
035 * A module loading post processor that integrates applicable external
036 * constraints into a given module when loaded.
037 *
038 * @see ModuleLoader#ModuleLoader(List)
039 */
040public class ExternalConstraintsModulePostProcessor implements IModuleLoader.IModulePostProcessor {
041  private static final Logger LOGGER = LogManager.getLogger(ExternalConstraintsModulePostProcessor.class);
042  @NonNull
043  private final List<IConstraintSet> registeredConstraintSets;
044
045  /**
046   * Create a new post processor.
047   *
048   * @param additionalConstraintSets
049   *          the external constraint sets to apply
050   */
051  public ExternalConstraintsModulePostProcessor(@NonNull Collection<IConstraintSet> additionalConstraintSets) {
052    this.registeredConstraintSets = ObjectUtils.notNull(additionalConstraintSets.stream()
053        .flatMap(set -> Stream.concat(
054            Stream.of(set),
055            set.getImportedConstraintSets().stream()))
056        .distinct()
057        .collect(Collectors.toUnmodifiableList()));
058  }
059
060  /**
061   * Get the external constraint sets associated with this post processor.
062   *
063   * @return the list of constraint sets
064   */
065  protected List<IConstraintSet> getRegisteredConstraintSets() {
066    return registeredConstraintSets;
067  }
068
069  @Override
070  public void processModule(IModule module) {
071    ConstraintComposingVisitor visitor = new ConstraintComposingVisitor();
072    IModuleNodeItem moduleItem = INodeItemFactory.instance().newModuleNodeItem(module);
073
074    StaticContext staticContext = StaticContext.builder()
075        .defaultModelNamespace(module.getXmlNamespace())
076        .build();
077    DynamicContext dynamicContext = new DynamicContext(staticContext);
078
079    for (IConstraintSet set : getRegisteredConstraintSets()) {
080      assert set != null;
081      applyConstraints(module, moduleItem, set, visitor, dynamicContext);
082    }
083  }
084
085  private static void applyConstraints(
086      @NonNull IModule module,
087      @NonNull IModuleNodeItem moduleItem,
088      @NonNull IConstraintSet set,
089      @NonNull ConstraintComposingVisitor visitor,
090      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext) {
091    for (ITargetedConstraints targeted : set.getTargetedConstraintsForModule(module)) {
092      // apply targeted constraints
093      String targetExpression = targeted.getTargetExpression();
094      MetapathExpression metapath = MetapathExpression.compile(targetExpression, dynamicContext.getStaticContext());
095      ISequence<?> items = metapath.evaluateAs(moduleItem, ResultType.SEQUENCE, dynamicContext);
096      assert items != null;
097
098      for (IItem item : items) {
099        if (item instanceof IDefinitionNodeItem) {
100          ((IDefinitionNodeItem<?, ?>) item).accept(visitor, targeted);
101        } else {
102          // log error
103          if (LOGGER.isErrorEnabled()) {
104            LOGGER.atError().log(
105                "Found non-definition item '{}' while applying external constraints using target expression '{}'.",
106                item.toString(),
107                targetExpression);
108          }
109        }
110      }
111    }
112  }
113}
